anthurium.care: Water once a week. Keep in bright, indirect light. Avoid overwatering.

clivia.care: Water when the soil feels dry. Provide bright, indirect sunlight.

dieffenbachia.care: Water moderately. Place in medium to low light. Avoid cold drafts.

dracaena.care: Water every 2 weeks. Needs low to medium light. Keep away from direct sunlight.

gloxinia.care: Water regularly but avoid soggy soil. Prefers bright, indirect light.

kalanchoe.care: Allow soil to dry between waterings. Needs bright, indirect sunlight.

orchid.care: Water weekly. Ensure bright, indirect sunlight and good air circulation.

sansevieria.care: Water sparingly. Thrives in low to bright indirect light.

violet.care: Water from the base to prevent leaf spots. Provide indirect sunlight.

zamioculcas.care: Water when soil is completely dry. Tolerates low light but prefers bright light.
